mapper.select: select count(0) from l_community_unit lcu left join l_community_layer lcl on lcu.ID = lcl.UNIT_ID left join l_community_household lch on lcl.ID = lch.LAYER_ID left join l_community_household_user lchu on lch.ID = lchu.HOUSEHOLD_ID inner join l_community_green_code code on lchu.USER_ID = code.USER_ID where lcu.IS_DELETE = 0 and lcu.IS_ENABLE =1 and lcl.IS_DELETE = 0 and lcl.IS_ENABLE =1 and lch.IS_DELETE = 0 and lch.IS_ENABLE =1 and lchu.IS_DELETE = 0 and lchu.IS_ENABLE =1 and code.IS_DELETE = 0 and code.IS_ENABLE =1 and lcu.ID = #{unitId}
